Just 2 more days to go…

Posted on January 12, 2014 by

This is it, people.  The 2nd book in the Clockwork Twist series will be released in just 2 days.  Are you excited?  I’m excited.  I’ve been wanting to publish this book for most of a year.  And now, it’s finally ready!  For those who just can’t wait, here’s one more little taste of the adventure to come.  Enjoy the first 5 chapters of Trick, right now!

We are so close to  Tuesday, January 14th.  The book will be available on Amazon.com, Createspace.com and Smashwords.com, right away, in both eBook and paperback.  And, if you buy the paperback on Amazon, you’ll get the eBook for free as well!  Trick will become available in the iBookstore, Barnes&Nobel, WHSmith, and other on-line stores in a week or two.  

Links to all of this will be coming in the launch post on Tuesday.  So, be sure to keep an eye on the old Facebook, Twitter, Tumblr, or blog!  So close, so close, so close…  Is it wrong to fan-girl over my own book?  Don’t answer that…
